detail_desc: Tube scarf in a soft knit containing glittery threads with ribbed edges.
Vest tops in cotton jersey. One with an all-over print an one in a solid colour.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs.

Platform ankle boots in imitation suede with covered heels and supple shafts with a zip in the side. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform front approx. 3 cm, heel 10 cm.
Belts in imitation leather with heart-shaped holes. One shimmering metallic belt and one glittery belt. Width 2 cm.

Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbed sections at the sides. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Regular fit.
T-shirt in soft jersey with an interactive motif on the front.
Wide, round-necked blouse in a cotton weave with embroidery, partially concealed buttons down the front and long, wide, cuffed balloon sleeves with embroidery.
Metal hoop earrings with pendants in various designs. Length approx. 2.5 cm.
Straight-style jumper in a rib-knit cotton blend containing some alpaca wool with long raglan sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a small, sewn-on fabric label at the hem and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, low dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline.
Top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, wrapover hood, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Straight-style jumper in a soft, fine knit with a lightly brushed finish. Long, wide raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Espadrilles in cotton with a braided jute trim around the soles and concealed elastic at the back of the heels. Fabric linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. Three pairs of the earrings are in acetate and resin. Length 4-6 cm.
Short dress in sequined stretch jersey with a V-neck, wrapover front, long sleeves and seam at the waist. Unlined.
A pair of braided metal hoop earrings. Diameter approx. 6.5 cm.

Short, fitted dress in mesh with sequined embroidery on the front. Deep V-neck with decorative lacing at the top, an opening at the back with a hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck, and a concealed zip at the back. Long sleeves with sequined embroidery at the cuffs. Partly lined.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Boxer shorts in a patterned cotton weave with an elasticated waist and fake fly.
Shorts in soft, stretch cotton twill with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets, back pockets and a fake fly.
Jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif front and back. Small stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and contrasting colour stripes down the sleeves.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps, jersey-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a wide hem. No fasteners.
T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend with a text print.
Cotton jersey top with a print motif on the front and a gently rounded hem. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
V-neck T-shirt in organic cotton jersey. Regular fit.
Swim pants and a swim top in UV-protective fabric. Print-patterned top with long raglan sleeves. Bottoms with a frill at the top and lined gusset. UPF 50.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim, straight legs.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif and rib-trimmed neckline.
Baby Exclusive. Balaclava in soft, textured-knit organic cotton with sewn-on ears at the top. Jersey lining.
Short-sleeved lace top with an opening at the back and button at the back of the neck. Raw scalloped edges at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved shirt woven in a cotton blend with a turn-down collar, French front and rounded hem. Slim Fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Hood with appliqués and a print motif. Glittery text print on the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Swimsuit with a deep V-neck, lined cups with removable inserts and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Lined.

Playsuit in a patterned crêpe weave with a frill-trimmed V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front. Elasticated seam at the waist and long sleeves with elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Unlined.
Boots in imitation patent leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a zip in one side. Fabric linings and insoles, and patterned soles.
Double-breasted jacket in a viscose blend with notch lapels and concealed side pockets. Lined.
Knee-length shorts in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and front and back pockets.
Skinny-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Top in patterned sweatshirt fabric with press-studs at the back and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted vest top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck opening at the front.
Dress in an airy, patterned weave with elastication at the top, narrow, braided shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and asymmetric hem. Satin lining.
Jumper in a soft cashmere knit with long raglan sleeves in a relaxed fit. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar, fake pocket at the top, partially concealed buttons down the front and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Ankle-length dress in soft jersey with a round, slightly wider neckline and wide shoulder straps. Relaxed fit with gathered tiers for added width and soft draping. Unlined.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Long dress in airy, patterned, lightly crinkled chiffon with a narrow stand-up collar, buttons at the top and long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a skirt with a flounce at the hem. V-neck, jersey inner dress with narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Metal rings in various designs, one with a faceted plastic bead.
Straight-cut top in linen jersey with a V-neck and short sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a round neckline and inset lace sections on the sleeves.
Jacket in soft faux fur with large notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and discreet pockets in the side seams. Lined in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
Knee-length off-the-shoulder dress in sturdy jersey with a slight sheen. Gentle V-neck at the front, a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
KELZUKI x H&M. Skirt in print-patterned, sequined tulle with a glittery elastic waistband. Lined.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with notch lapels, a wrapover top with a concealed press-stud, and a concealed zip at the back. Seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Long-sleeved hoodie in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in soft, garter-stitched cotton with a round neck and buttons down the front.
Calf-length skirt in a pleated weave. High waist with covered elastication.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
All-in-one pyjamas in checked organic cotton jersey with a collar, open chest pocket, and press-studs down the front and along one leg.
Narrow tie in a satin weave. Width 5 cm.
Short, fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the front, front pockets, and long sleeves with slits at the cuffs. Lined.
Sleeveless dress in soft organic cotton jersey with decorative bows at the shoulders, a gathered seam at the waist and gently flared skirt.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a soft, lightly brushed finish. Stand-up collar, zip and wind flap with hook and loop fasteners down the front, flap front pockets with press-studs and ribbing at the cuffs.
Blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a turtle neck. Opening at the front, an opening with buttons at the back of the neck, and long trumpet sleeves.
Mesh trainers with rubber details, lacing at the front, and a loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles, and EVA (ethylene-vinyl acetate) and rubber soles.
Sleeveless jersey dress in a short, fitted style with shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with an embroidered pattern.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short dress in soft sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed neckline and short puff sleeves with ribbed trims. Soft brushed inside.
Shirt dress in soft viscose twill with a collar, button placket, long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Longer at the back. Unlined.

Long-sleeved shirt with a waistcoat and bow tie. Shirt in cotton poplin with a collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Waistcoat in a lightly brushed weave with buttons down the front. Bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back.

Tunic in soft Tencel™ lyocell twill with a collar, concealed buttons at the top, open chest pockets and a yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Long skirt in an airy weave with an elasticated waist and high slits in the sides. Short underskirt.
